resources.string: Here\'s the big moment. Don\'t panic!

We rank famous (past), hot (current), and rising (future) places to hang out based on the frequency of location check-in. WhereYaApp also alerts you in real time if a certain number of your friends create a hotspot by checking into locations within close proximity.
WhereYaApp accesses your Facebook friends in order to let you know in real time when you\'re near family, friends or evens friends of a friend.
Be able to know exactly when and where someone you care for last checked in.
Our algorithms are constantly working to find the newest up and coming places so you can always be where the scene is.
This is the community we\'re creating. Come join us!
Which location are you in? or which is closest to you?
